TABLE.NAME: block_credits
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for block_credits, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: creditedon
FIELD.COMMENT: The UNIX timestamp at which the credits were credited.

FIELD.NAME: validuntil
FIELD.COMMENT: The UNIX timestamp until which credits are valid for.

TABLE.NAME: block_credits_tx
TABLE.COMMENT: History of all transactions of a person's credits.

FIELD.NAME: actinguserid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user ID who initiated the transaction.

FIELD.NAME: amount
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of credits. A negative number represents a debit.

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: The component responsible for the transaction.

FIELD.NAME: reasoncode
FIELD.COMMENT: A codename for the transaction. The responsible component can interpret it.

FIELD.NAME: reasonargs
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON encoded list of arguments that can be parsed by the component.

FIELD.NAME: reasondesc
FIELD.COMMENT: A description of the reason in plain English.

FIELD.NAME: publicnote
FIELD.COMMENT: A public note attached to this transaction.

FIELD.NAME: privatenote
FIELD.COMMENT: A private note attached to this transaction.

FIELD.NAME: recordedon
FIELD.COMMENT: The UNIX timestamp at which the transaction was recorded.
